price: 那是因为安拉是归信的人们的保护者；不归信的人们，绝无保护者。
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha mawlā alladhīna āmanū wa-anna al-kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
